Combat
Hit Points: 65 Initiative: 0 Armor Class: 11 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Atharak; Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Martial; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple
Armor: Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+6 1d4+2 R20/60); Sling (+4 1d4 R30/120); Staghorn (+6 1d4+2 R20/60); Unarmed (+6 1d4+2)
Combat Notes:
Brawler: Unarmed strike inflicts d4 damage; may use bonus action for second strike, grapple, or knock prone
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +24
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Battlefield Healer: Allies regain extra HD from long rest
Captor: Adv on Athletics to grapple when unseen; grapple silently; move at full speed w/out OA while grappling
Cunning Action: Dash, Disengage, or Hide bonus action 1/rd
Fast Hands: Use Cunning Action for Sleight Of Hand check, to disarm a trap, open a lock, or Use An Object
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): May re-roll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Harrier: Mounted 30' move negates foe OA and causes successful melee attacks to knock prone
Improvised Fighter: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Improvised weapon damage increased to 1d6/May destroy improvised weapon for +1 damage die
Knife Fighter: Dagger crits on 18; crit hit inflicts Disadv on combat for 1 rd
Paranoid: Cannot be surprised when asleep/Automatic Dodge in first round
Second Wind: Regain 1d10+1 HP 1/short rest
Shieldwall Soldier: R5' Allies gain +1 AC (+2 if self holding shield)
Sneak Attack: +6d6 damage on attacks w/Adv or shared threat
Uncanny Dodge: Use Reaction for half damage

Save Notes: Evasion: Dex save yields no damage instead of half
